(:action plug
    ; Universal plugging action for connecting devices and cables
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?device1 - object ?device2 - object ?cable - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?actor ?device1)
        (at ?actor ?device2)
        (or (has_hdmi_port ?device1) (has_av_output ?device1) (not (connected ?device1 ?device2)))
        (or (has_hdmi_port ?device2) (not (connected ?cable ?device1)) (not (connected ?cable ?device2))))
    :effect (and 
        (connected ?device1 ?device2)
        (connected ?cable ?device1)
        (connected ?cable ?device2)
        (power ?device1)
        (power ?device2))
